title: WildTrax
description: online platform for managing, storing, processing, sharing, and discovering biological and environmental sensor data
taxonomicOrSoundTypeSpecializationIfAny: environmental sensors (camera traps and passive acoustic monitoring)
dataExploration: use graphical interface for viewing spectrograms; explore public data; share data
organization: organize bioacoustic projects; integrate multiple data types including camera traps and point counts
classifierFeatures: run included pretrained classifiers (BirdNET currently, HawkEars to be available in 2025)
